column1: Memorial Services will be held on Friday (June 12
column2: 2015) at 5:00 P.M. at the Suchon Funeral Home in Plymouth. The Rev. Keith Hunholz
column3: Pastor of St. Paul Christian Church in Elkhart Lake will officiate.    Visitation will be at the Suchon Funeral Home on Friday from 4:00 P.M. until the time of services.
